ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: good point. in this case she has dug a hole for herself because she already admitted that her higher level character gave it to her. besides that i do not know
ygData.messageBody:
good point. in this case she has dug a hole for herself because she already
admitted that her higher level character gave it to her. besides that i do
not know of any high level character that would give such a low level
character an item that is worth over 200 platinum. no matter what the deed


-----Original Message-----
From: Joe Wallace <joew88@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, May 23, 1999 9:57 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


>From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
>
>I think that if it was "nothing" then the GMs wouldn't bother to give a 30
>day suspension for it.
>
>But it brings up an interesting point--do the GMs consider it "twinking"
for
>a player to have more than one character and transfer powerful items from
>one character to another? Does anyone know just exactly what "twinking"
>is? Couldn't it be possible for a high level character to reward a low
>level one with a fine item for some service or other? How can anyone, GMs
>included, tell at face value whether or not "twinking" is taking place?
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Alex Cordero <gemini5719@...>
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Sunday, May 23, 1999 9:50 PM
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
>
>
>> From: "Alex Cordero" <gemini5719@...>
>>
>> Man why don't you leave her alone, everyone in the game isn't gonna fight
>> there way to the top some people play that way. Play the game yourself
and
>> do your thing. It's kind of painfull to get a 30 day suspension. If you
>> really want to do harm to someone look for the people exploiting bugs and
>> stuff like that not some tiny little thing like tweaking their characters
>> and you never know she might have had something happen to her like for
>> example a friend of mine refused to pay a toll in freeport and the guard
>> attacked him so he killed the guard now he can't walk into freeport
>because
>> the guards kill him so he made a new character and transfered all his
>stuff
>> to his new character. Find things out or just mind your own buisness
>before
>> messing up a persons gaming. Her tweaking isn't doing you any damage so
>just
>> leave it alone.
>>
>> I mean no disrespect by it but it just bothersme to see people who have a
>> fit out of nothing.
>>
>> >From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>> >Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>> >To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>> >Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
>> >Date: Sun, 23 May 1999 21:05:47 -0700
>> >
>> >i saw her again today
>> >
>> >lol she tried to lie her way out of it (like this is even remotely
>> >believable) she says she just knows how to play well! lol... i wish i
>> >remembered her name! GMs give a 30 day suspension for twinking muahaha
>> >
>> >anyone remember if i included her name in the original post?
>> >
>> > -----Original Message-----
>> > From: Simon Hinshelwood <iktome@...>
>> > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>> > Date: Sunday, May 23, 1999 6:36 AM
>> > Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
>> >
>> >
>> > Oh oh its started! The slippery downward slope into UO?
>> > Simon
>> >
>> >

>> > shypht wrote:
>> >
>> > The wonderfull world of twinking. In a way I dont care if people
do
>> >this, I have seen lvl 15 in oracle robes which are found of of lvl 40ish
>> >mobs I think. But, what I dont like is how guilds "take over" an item
>spawn
>> >site to supply all of their lower lvls with items takeing away the
chacne
>> >that others have to get the items.
